name: SSE4.2 Fix
description: This will allow the game to run on processors which do not support the SSE4.2 instruction set. If you can successfully boot the game, do NOT check this.

name: All songs/difficulties unlocked
description: Bypasses unlocks on all songs and difficulties

name: All songs "Safe"
description: Failing early won't drop you out of your session

name: No "Safe" banner on jackets
description: Remove visual clutter

name: Boot into Event Mode
description: Starts the game in EVENT MODE

name: PFree (Unlimited plays)
description: Song clears/scores only, mission progress and custom settings do not save

name: Allow ARS (Alternative Rate System) Option
description: At gauge select, go to excessive and press BT-D to enable

name: Freeze timer in all modes
description: Useful to play with Omega Dimension Ex-Track

name: Unlock all Nemsys Crew
description: Unlocks all the Nesys Crew characters

name: Non-Effective Rate gauges start at 0%
description: This affects all "Hard" Gauge types

name: Non-Effective Rate gauges do not recover
description: This affects all "Hard" Gauge types

name: E: drive fix
description: Fix crash caused by no E: drive

name: Shorter monitor check
description: Runs for 300 frames (5 seconds) instead of 1200 (20 seconds), recommended only if you have a very stable framerate

name: 6 digits in monitor check
description: Purely visual, does not affect anything besides the FPS display

name: SSE4.2 Fix
description: Allows the game to run on processors which do not support the SSE4.2 instruction set. If you can successfully boot the game, do NOT check this

name: Unlock All Songs
description: Bypasses all unlock requirements on songs

name: Unlock All 12s
description: Unlocks all level 12s

name: Skip CAMERA DEVICE ERROR prompt
description: Prevents the CAMERA DEVICE ERROR message from popping up on boot

name: Premium Free (1 Player Mode)
description: Enables PREMIUM FREE mode for single-player

name: Premium Free (2 Player Mode)
description: Enables PREMIUM FREE mode for two-players

name: Premium Free Timer Freeze
description: Freezes the timer in PREMIUM FREE mode, allowing unlimited play until exit

name: Standard/Menu Timer Freeze
description: Freezes the timer in STANDARD and in-game menus such as song select

name: Cursor lock
description: After song finishes, song select remains on previous song

name: CS-Style Song Start Delay
description: Holding Start will pause the song at the beginning until you release it

name: Play video preview on all songs
description: By default, only some songs in the beginner folder show a BGA preview on the music select screen. This edit extends this function to every song in any folder.

name: Hide INSERT COIN[S] text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Hide CREDIT: %d text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Hide CREDIT: %d COIN %d / %d text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Hide EXTRA PASELI: %d text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Hide PASELI: %d text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Hide PASELI: NO ACCOUNT text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Hide PASELI: ****** text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Free play text to LED ticker (Bottom Right)
description: Song Title/Ticker information will display instead of FREEPLAY

name: LED Ticker (Top Left)
description: This does NOT require FREEPLAY on

name: Quick Retry
description: Guest or non-VIP Card Players - Hold VEFX and Effect during a song to quick restart

name: Expert Course Force Open (in offline or local mode)
Shorter Monitor Check
description: Runs for 120 frames (2 seconds) instead of 1200 (20 seconds), recommended only if you have a very stable framerate

name: E: drive fix
description: Fix crash caused by no E: drive

name: Prevent Windows volume change on boot
description: If your volume gets forced to max, turn this on

name: Premium Free (1 Player Mode)
description: Enables the PREMIUM FREE mode for single-player

name: Force enable fast/slow
description: Forces fast/slow notifications on, ideal for guests

name: Force background judgement
description: Forces background judgment on, ideal for guests

name: Force darkest background
description: Forces the dark background on, ideal for guests

name: Unlock all songs (OLD)
description: Do not use this anymore. It's only here to toggle off.

name: Unlock all songs
description: Unlocks all e-amusement songs, EVENT MODE songs, ACES FOR ACES, and ENDYMION

name: Tutorial Skip
description: Skips the in-game tutorial

name: Timer Freeze
description: Freezes the in-game timer

name: Unlock options
description: Unlocks e-amusement exclusive options such as ARROW COLOR

name: Force Extra Stage/Extra Encore Stage (fixed)
description: Forces EXTRA STAGE/EXTRA ENCORE STAGE on

name: Disable Credit Consumption
description: Similar to FREE PLAY, but allows premium credit options. Requires 1 credit.

description: Runs for 300 frames (5 seconds) instead of 1200 (20 seconds), recommended only if you have a very stable framerate

description: Freezes the timer in STANDARD and in-game menus such as song select

name: 90sec Music Select Timer
description: Make sure your Select Time option is set to "45 SEC" in the Game Options for this to work!

name: Cursor lock
description: After song finishes, song select remains on previous song

name: CS-Style Song Start Delay
description: Holding START will pause the song at the beginning until you release it

name: Play video preview on all songs
description: By default, only some songs in the beginner folder show a BGA preview on the music select screen. This edit extends this function to every song in any folder.

name: Hide INSERT COIN[S] text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Hide CREDIT: %d text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Hide CREDIT: %d COIN %d / %d text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Hide EXTRA PASELI: %d text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Hide PASELI: %d text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Hide PASELI: NO ACCOUNT text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Hide PASELI: ****** text
description: Hides the white corner text

name: Free play text to LED ticker (Bottom Right)
description: Song Title/Ticker information will display instead of FREEPLAY

name: LED Ticker (Top Left)
description: This does NOT require FREEPLAY on

name: Dark Mode
description: Removes frame assets from playfield during song

name: Disable Bar Lines
description: Removes white measure bars during song. Great with Dark Mode!

name: Remove Song Select Color Banners
description: Removes banner colorization from LEGGENDARIA and new songs

name: Quick Retry
description: Guest or non-VIP Card Players - Hold VEFX and EFFECT during a song to quick restart

name: Debug Mode
description: While in-game, press F1 to enable menu.  (Disables Profile/Score saving)

name: Skip Card Entry
description: Useful for those without service or wish to prevent login

name: Expert Course Force Open (in offline or local mode)
Shorter monitor check
description: Runs for 300 frames (5 seconds) instead of 1200 (20 seconds), recommended only if you have a very stable framerate

name: 6 digits in monitor check
description: Purely visual, does not affect anything besides the FPS display

name: Skip decide screen
description: Immediately loads into chart after selection

name: Infinite Final Layer
description: Forces the game to be set to the final layer indefinitely

name: Auto Event Mode Toggled (Freeplay (Coin Options) must be ON for this to work efficiently
description: Forces event mode on

name: All songs/difficulties unlocked
description: Bypasses unlocks on all songs and difficulties

name: All songs "Safe"
description: Failing early won't drop you out of your session

name: No "Safe" banner on jackets
description: Remove visual clutter

name: Prevent Windows volume change on boot
description: If your volume gets forced to max, turn this on

name: Boot into Event Mode
description: Starts the game in EVENT MODE

name: Disable EVENT MODE/FREE PLAY text
description: Removes the white corner text

name: PFree (Unlimited plays)
description: Song clears/scores only, mission progress and custom settings do not save

name: Allow ARS (Alternative Rate System) Option
description: At gauge select, go to excessive and press BT-D to enable

name: Freeze timer in all modes
description: Useful to play with Omega Dimension Ex-Track

name: Non-Effective Rate gauges start at 0%
description: This affects all "Hard" Gauge types

name: Non-Effective Rate gauges do not recover
description: This affects all "Hard" Gauge types

name: Omega Dimension Matching scene as default
description: Replaces stock matching scene with Omega Dimension matching

name: QC Mode
description: Replaces IC Card Check in test menu

name: English folder text
description: FX-L button on appeal card and song screens

name: All songs/difficulties unlocked
description: Bypasses unlocks on all songs and difficulties

name: All songs "Safe"
description: Failing early won't drop you out of your session

name: No "Safe" banner on jackets
description: Remove visual clutter

description: If your volume gets forced to max, turn this on

description: Starts the game in EVENT MODE

description: Song clears/scores only, mission progress and custom settings do not save

description: At gauge select, go to excessive and press BT-D to enable

description: Useful to play with Omega Dimension Ex-Track

description: This affects all "Hard" Gauge types

description: This affects all "Hard" Gauge types

description: Replaces stock matching scene with Omega Dimension matching
